base_template.name: Bootstrap Base
base_template.html:
<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
    <head>
        <style>
            {{css}}
        </style>
        <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.0.2/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet" integrity="sha384-EVSTQN3/azprG1Anm3QDgpJLIm9Nao0Yz1ztcQTwFspd3yD65VohhpuuCOmLASjC" crossorigin="anonymous">
    </head>
    <body>
        {% block content %}{% endblock %}
    </body>
</html>

template.name: All Fields - Checks
template.template_md:
{% block content %}

Checks

{% for item in data_sources.allFieldsChecks %} {% endfor %}
id created_by created_time modified_by modified_time agent_id policy_id overridden_by_policy name check_type email_alert text_alert dashboard_alert fails_b4_alert run_interval alert_severity error_threshold warning_threshold disk ip script_id script_args env_vars info_return_codes warning_return_codes timeout svc_name svc_display_name pass_if_start_pending pass_if_svc_not_exist restart_if_stopped svc_policy_mode log_name event_id event_id_is_wildcard event_type event_source event_message fail_when search_last_days number_of_events_b4_alert managed_by_policy
{{ item.id }} {{ item.created_by }} {{ item.created_time }} {{ item.modified_by }} {{ item.modified_time }} {{ item.agent_id }} {{ item.policy_id }} {{ item.overridden_by_policy }} {{ item.name }} {{ item.check_type }} {{ item.email_alert }} {{ item.text_alert }} {{ item.dashboard_alert }} {{ item.fails_b4_alert }} {{ item.run_interval }} {{ item.alert_severity }} {{ item.error_threshold }} {{ item.warning_threshold }} {{ item.disk }} {{ item.ip }} {{ item.script_id }} {{ item.script_args }} {{ item.env_vars }} {{ item.info_return_codes }} {{ item.warning_return_codes }} {{ item.timeout }} {{ item.svc_name }} {{ item.svc_display_name }} {{ item.pass_if_start_pending }} {{ item.pass_if_svc_not_exist }} {{ item.restart_if_stopped }} {{ item.svc_policy_mode }} {{ item.log_name }} {{ item.event_id }} {{ item.event_id_is_wildcard }} {{ item.event_type }} {{ item.event_source }} {{ item.event_message }} {{ item.fail_when }} {{ item.search_last_days }} {{ item.number_of_events_b4_alert }} {{ item.managed_by_policy }}
{% endblock %}
